name: @energyweb/utils-demo
description: showcases the working of origin release B in a variety of situations.

scripts.start-all: concurrently --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 1500 -n eth,backend,deploy "yarn start-ganache" "yarn origin-backend" "wait-on tcp:8545 && yarn start"
scripts.start-ganache: ganache-cli -m 'chalk park staff buzz chair purchase wise oak receive avoid avoid home' -l 8000000 -e 1000000 -a 40 -h 0.0.0.0
scripts.test:all: concurrently --success first --kill-others -n eth,backend,test "yarn start-ganache -p 8553" "PORT=3038 yarn origin-backend" "wait-on tcp:8553 && yarn test"
